page.title: 07HOWLISH VIEW (Part 1)
page.content: Howlish View is situated just off Collingwood Street on the south side of Coundon. The houses in our street are terraced. Traffic in our street is very heavy. There are also lots of cars parked down the side of our street. There used to be an A.A. van there but not any more. The people in our street are really nice. There is an old lady next door to us who is 86 and partially blind. On the other side is a teacher called Alyson Smith. Further up the street live a few strange people. One boy called Stuart is really stupid. Down the street is a play field for the children. I play in there with Paul Eales. He is moving soon. Recently we have had a new road and pavement put in our street. It was really needed. The children in our street sometimes have a game of "Red Rover."
